reviews.review_text: Ordered a more expensive one from Amazon. What a mistake. There were 2 usless curtain rods in the package. It said spring tension, but the springs didn't spring. I could here them in the product. I had to go out of my way to return! Should have just came to Walmart Mainstays to begin with. Works perfectly with no guessing, and no thinking it's 'user' issues.

reviews.title: Prevent frame damage
reviews.review_text: Appreciate ability to hang curtains without putting holes into walls/frames. The rubber ends prevent additional damage to the frame. Also this product is very mobile I with held a 5 star review because no weight limit was provided which would have been very helpful in deciding on a product.

The product was very thin and does not have a strong hold between the two walls its placed on, but it was very cheap and I did not expect it to be high quality for the very affordable 3 dollar price tag. Very satisfied with my purchase as it was more than adequate for what I needed it for...would probably not recommend for heavy fabric shower curtains ect...

reviews.title: cheap, easy, works perfect
reviews.review_text: a EASY cheap fix for putting fabric blinds on the single window on the side of my house that keeps prying eyes out of the garage. I also used one for the bathroom window of the shower. perfect when you don't want to have to drill holes to install brackets as all the windows in the rest of my house has for blinds.

reviews.title: Gets the job done
reviews.review_text: It's very inexpensive, so you get what you pay for, does the job. After purchasing the first one, I purchased another since I love the price and it gets the job done. I'm sure there are better ones out there, but you can't beat the price of this one!

reviews.title: Good for lightweight fabrics only
reviews.review_text: I would recommend this for curtains that are short and light such as cafe curtains that are sheer, made of lace or very thin cotton. It works well for that purpose but it is so light and the pole is so thin that it wouldn't be able to support drapes or anything just a bit heavy. I used it for cafe curtains and it has held up ok and worked so far. Not sure how durable it will end up being, but it's working well right now.

reviews.title: Cheap option for quick curtains.
reviews.review_text: I thought these would be a great option for cheap curtains but they kept falling down when opening or closing the curtains and if you tighten them too much they just bend. The rubber ends come off and my kids like to take them. They might work good for a house with no children.

I have purchased similar tension rods to use in small windows with very light weight curtains in the past with no issues. However, these do not stay in place (fall off the window) when I attempt to adjust the light weight curtains. I will try repositioning them, being more careful in adjusting the curtains, but I am considering returning them.

reviews.title: Cheap short term fail
reviews.review_text: I used these to install shower curtains along my screened porch for a week to prevent construction dust from next door coming inside. Haha, they're not 100% worthless - 6 out of 8 blew down repeatedly, but I finally got them to stay up by taping them to the screen frames. Not recommended for anything long term.

I never received item. I was charged and I signed up for trial of delivery service. Other 2 items in order arrived, but the rod did not. I checked carefully multiple times. I let Walmart know and they just said sorry, but never delivered a replacement, nor did I recieve a refund even after a follow up request. Do NOT sign up.
This tension rod is excellent for the price! I was surprised by how strong it is and able to hold full-length curtains with no problem. It arrived just as described and is highly adjustable.
Thought I order wrong size however these work well and no drilling into window facing or wall. also is keeping up 2 panels of curtains so holds a heavier weight .
This didn't even make it out the package with all the parts. It looked like it was made with one upgrade above aluminum foil, and literally fell apart when I put the curtain on. Waste of money.

reviews.title: basic, inexpensive, and works perfectly
reviews.review_text: needed a tension rod for a curtain. this was pretty cheap cost wise which was one reason I purchased it....and it works just as it should. easy to adjust to varying lengths. very pleased !
made with thin metal and plastic. bends out of shape with minimal pressure, and then is useless to hang a kitchen curtain on. I would not purchase this again.

reviews.title: Holiday decor
reviews.review_text: Used for holiday decorations for front entry. Tension rod inside pool noodle, wrap with garland and insert decorative picks, then insert in front doorway / entry.

reviews.title: Item missing from order.
reviews.review_text: I did not receive the rension rod wirh the rest of my order, I had rrepairmen installung a new water heater and did not immediately notice that it was missing. There were a lot of bags and I guess it got left somewhere.

Because it was much needed at the right time my shower rod was broke and i thought i had got the wrong product but it turneds i just had to read the directions on. How to use it and then i understood it was very helpful.
it wasn't as long as described and didn't fit my shower but a good price and value for the price and looks nice easy installation and quick to install

reviews.title: Plants are not healthy
reviews.review_text: 5 out of 6 arrived with yellow and brown leaves . 2 have roots growing out of the bottom of the pots . I'm not holding out a lot of hope for any to survive. Plants were clearly healthy at one point , maybe it's a shipping issue ?

reviews.title: Great for organization
reviews.review_text: Used this hack to organize under my kitchen sink. Perfect! Although it's not strong enough to hold a full spray bottle but it does the job with less full ones.

reviews.title: Great flexible curtain rod
reviews.review_text: This curtain rod was perfect for the job we had. It was small enough in diameter to fit through the hole we had in the hanging. It was very easy to adjust and strong enough to hold the curtain that we hung in the kitchen doorway.

All I needed was a simple rad in my bathroom. I have an old-fashioned house and I wanted to put up a Halloween sheer black and bat and spider printed curtain and it was perfect. It's like a tiny little shower curtain rod. It was great.

reviews.title: 28-48 Does not extend
reviews.review_text: This rod does not extend 48 inches at All! Not sure if the one they sent to me malfunctioned or because so cheaply made. Not worth all the headache to return but I still will

reviews.title: Bent in half
reviews.review_text: This cannot handle the weight of anything other than VERY light sheer curtains. I hung one blackout curtain panel on this rod and it bent in half. You get what you pay for.

reviews.title: Very thin diameter and cheap metal
reviews.review_text: Not very good quality. If you're planning on using for a 48 inch window you'll need a support in the middle. Unless you're using paper thin weightless curtains. My curtains weigh a total of 0.5lb and this kept falling down until I put a support in the middle. I even opened the rod about 2 inches longer than the inside of my window frame and spring loaded inside the frame and it still fell down. If you're using it for smaller frames it might be ok because the metal of the rod would be doubled up, but having it extended for a 48 inch frame it it's horrible

reviews.title: Mainstays 18-28 in. Adjustable Spring Tension Curt
reviews.review_text: Don't waste your money or your time!!!…. ((Mainstays 18-28 in. Adjustable Spring Tension Curtain Rod )) Metal is cheaply made. Window it doesn't stay up.bend to easly I wouldn't call it Metal. Light weight ‘too Light weight' wouldn't even hold up even the lightest sheer curtains…..

reviews.title: Cheap
reviews.review_text: Rod bends, even with nothing on it. Not sturdy. Width I need is 42” so next size up is 44” . If you're in a situation like this I'd pick a different rod that is more supportive. You can add a center hook for support but defeats the purpose purpose of being tension based as you'd have to nail in a hook anyway. In that case I'd just use a traditional rod.

reviews.title: Cheap, but does the trick.
reviews.review_text: This is very small, very thin, a little ugly, and all around very basic. It is not the most sturdy if you're going to be messing with it a bunch. However, it's fine enough for low traffic uses. I'm using one to stabilize some of season storage in a closet.

reviews.title: Smart Storage Fix for Under-Sink Bottles
reviews.review_text: I bought this adjustable rod to use under the sink, and it turned out to be the perfect solution for hanging spray bottles and organizing cleaning supplies, it's perfect. It's easy to install, holds a good amount of weight, and helps free up space on the cabinet floor. The tension holds well without slipping, and being able to adjust the length made it easy to fit my setup. This has made my under-sink area way more functional and less cluttered. Great find at Walmart for a simple but really helpful storage upgrade.

i am unable to review this item as it was never received. I did a pick up order at the store and this item was not added to the items I ordered. Will complain to the store about this issue. This happens re often than not. Unfotunately i may have to order from Amazon.

In the search I typed “shower curtain rod”. This item was listed in the middle of all the shower curtain rods and this is definitely not a simple mainstay shower curtain rod. What I received it was a regular curtain rod, why was it listed under “shower curtain rods” if it's not for a shower. I want a refund for the items only plus the $6.99 fee, exclude the driver fee as it is mot his fault. This is highly misleading.

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.review_text: I chose the wrong size, too thin, and then waited too long to return it. Now I'm stuck with a spring rod without being able to extend it. I purchased it for an open linen closet so I could hang curtains but now still open. My mistake.
It didn't look the greatest and appeared to be coming apart, but I went ahead and tried it and it still worked fine. Not the greatest quality, but still got the job done.

reviews.title: They hold up!
reviews.review_text: I ordered online and was very pleased with the price, but when the items arrived, I was doubtful they would work for our needs. Needless to say, I was very pleasantly surprised that they could hold the weight of the drapes without any problems.

reviews.title: Garbage do not buy
reviews.review_text: Absolute trash. It came broken and clearly never got put up because it was already broken. It would have cost me more in gas to return it. So right in the trash it went.

reviews.title: Satisfied!
reviews.review_text: Simple, yet effective! I needed an adjustable rod for a project and this worked great! It's the second one I have purchased and I've been very pleased.

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.review_text: Packaged horribly. Product came bent and unable to use I threw it out. Will never ever order from Walmart ever again. Just looking at how they packaged it showed they cared nothing about the product t making it to its destination in one piece.

This rod worked perfectly in a small window where I didn't want to make a hole in the tile to mount curtain rod hardware. The spring tension was so easy to install and the curtains fit nicely. Up in seconds!

reviews.title: Worked Perfectly for Window Ornaments
reviews.review_text: I used 2 of these to hang some light weight ornaments in the windows so the review is based on that application. Lightweight, fast and easy to adjust the width and no issues with them slipping down over a period of 5-6 weeks. Total weight per rod was about 1 pound or less.

reviews.title: Sturdier and gripper than other curtain rods.
reviews.review_text: This is a durable curtain rod, unlike some other ones which I've had bend while trying to install them. It's easy to install. While I've had other curtain rods fall when I move the curtain, this one stays in place even when I open the curtain all the way.

This rod was bent when I received it. I went to the store to exchange it and they refused to even exchange bc I bought it online with a gift card that I no longer have and they don't have the option to even exchange online purchases. They credited that gift card ( which I no longer have) ans said tough luck.

reviews.title: Works great, better than expected
reviews.review_text: These worked perfectly to hold up my vintage kitchen curtains which are not very lightweight. So far they are staying in place and am able to open and close curtains without a problem of it sliding or falling down. I have a magnetic curtain rod on my back metal door to my kitchen which holds that curtain securely in place as well.

reviews.title: Easy to install, easy on the wallet
reviews.review_text: Easy to install, great price, and made in USA while competitors' products are often not. I first tried a more expensive Kirsch product that was damaged when I opened one but the others were very hard to adjust with a screw based mechanism instead of simply twisting the rod like these.

Easy to assemble onto your shower walls. Keep in mind that once the temperature changes this spring can come loose and fall down. Ours has fallen about three times during the season changes. Other than that good product and keeps our heavier shower curtain up right

The tension rods work well and are very easy to be installed. The negative thing was that I had to wait for about an hour at this particular store to pick them up. The customer service personnel at this store were not very helpful. Overworked or understaffed? I would give the products 5 stars but the pick-up services 1 star.

reviews.title: Don't expect much… you get what you pay for…
reviews.review_text: ‘Low cost' but not great quality. You get what you pay for and I didn't want to spend much for what I was using it for. Extending was easy but doesn't stay in place well. As for the drapes it's only holding 2 very light weight sheer panels and it's already fallen twice. Ends of rubbers want to slide down easily. Bend easily. It's taking a lot of time %26 effort but hopefully it will stay up %26 in place now….

I am glad that this came but I regret buying it because it's poor quality. However, the delivery came right by my apartment door so thank you and I will maybe just use it for some other thing I went and bought another one from local store better one the Walmart thank you for delivering by my door. This is important that this package was not get on lost.

I am sorry TO SAY " I DID NOT GET IT WITH MY ORDER .I CHECKED IT WAS ORDERED %26 PAID FOR. I WOULD LOVE TO HAVE IT." .WHAT CAN I DO ???? THANK YOU FOR YOUR HELP.. YOUR DELIVERIES ARE ALWAYS GREAT %26 FRIENDLY.THANK YOU JUDY JACKSON JUST HAD MY DELIVERY. AT 619 E MAIN. VALLEY CENTER, KS 67147

reviews.title: Doesn't damage walls; No tools necessary.
reviews.review_text: Instead of drilling holes, we use these rods and they're fairly inexpensive unless you have as many windows as we do. We live in a historic home with fresh walls. We don't want to harm the beautiful woodwork or add holes to the walls. These are perfect for this and would be a great asset in a rental, too!

I was charged for this item and they showed it to be delivered the driver did not even pull up into my driveway they parked on the street they dropped my groceries at the front door they did not know they did not ring my doorbell and they did not leave my curtain rod I do not have my curtain rod and I paid for it

You sent the product that says on pack it fits the size but it didn't work. And I wanted to exchange but that didn't happen. Your app for store pickup didn't work, went the store and sat 15 minutes realized it didn't work. So that was very disappointing. My very first time ordering from Your company.

reviews.title: Made Better than Years Past
reviews.review_text: I think the spring rods are made a little better than they were years ago. I have 4 that I use in my kitchen windows with light weight curtains. They stay in place just fine. These are good for light weight curtains and curtains that you are not going to be constantly pulling on.

reviews.title: Wrong delivery
reviews.review_text: The order was delivered to the wrong address. Somehow your system changed the delivery address to my old address, which is an hour away. I didn't realize the mistake until I couldn't find the package after being told it was delivered. I made another order and was very careful that the address was correct on the order. When I received the conformation, the address was changed on it also. The system would not let me correct the address so I canceled the order. I don't know what the problem is; but I don't plan to use your order system again.. R Fosdick

The quality of "staying power" for these rods has reduced over the years. i have a few that are about 7 years old and still holding strong. I have others that are less than a year old that not as sturdy holding their positions. I love the versatility of their uses, though.

Product wasn't available in store. Got it shipped to me once and it was damaged. Asked to return and Walmart sent a replacement. Well, I just got the replacement today and it's also bent sigh. Maybe the delivery people need to do a better job stacking the deliveries.

reviews.title: Don't waste your money
reviews.review_text: This is an absolute joke. I don't know how others are saying that this is "sturdy". Mainstays has gone 'WAY downhill in their quality these last few years or longer. THIS rod was bent in the inside when it arrived, not on the outside, so whoever sent it, was hiding the fact that it was busted. But even if it weren't bent, no way would this hold a curtain of any weight. I hung it up and put a washcloth on it, and it promptly fell down and broke. It's not even worth the hassle of returning. I'm completely DONE with Mainstays from now on. There are simply too many products being sold by them that are pure crap. And their prices are higher than they were, when the quality was good.

reviews.title: Easy Installation
reviews.review_text: Bought these tension rods for hanging sheers in my home and an apartment building I own. Easy to use and installed within minutes. No more holes in the wall or window frames! I will definitely continue to use tension rods for my other window covering needs.
These items work perfectly. I like that they come in variable lengths. Makes it so easy to place in window frames.

reviews.title: CHEAP
reviews.review_text: very thin I don't even know if it can hold my curtain up. I'll recommend to get a more better one. I guess you get what you pay for.

reviews.title: It works fine and was a good deal
reviews.review_text: Not much to say. it's a curtain rod and is very effective holding up light weight curtains such as kitchen window curtains.

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.review_text: The piece just broke. It was rough pulling it apart and it just broke. This item was cheap and not a useful product.

reviews.title: Works fine!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this for my bathroom window. Fits perfectly. Now I can take showers knowing nobody can see me. Also blackout curtains are good to use.

reviews.title: Curtain rod joy
reviews.review_text: Exactly what I ordered. I had bought one at a Walmart store, but I needed more, so I ordered online. Same item, and quick delivery to my house.
Described diameter is not the rod diameter. Does not hold anything weighing in above a single thin plastic shower curtain.
The rod quality is questionable in terms of the flimsy metal sheets. But, for the price it does the job very well.

reviews.title: good enough
reviews.review_text: It's a lot smaller (round wise) than I thought, but it still works perfectly for what I wanted to use it for.
I like tension rods because they are easier to use and do not require any tools. I highly recommend this tension rod!

reviews.title: Clever design and easy installation
reviews.review_text: The rod was used to hang a lightweight doorway curtain. The installation was very easy and completed within a minute. Very clever design and a perfect fit for our needs.

reviews.title: Ready to use
reviews.review_text: Best price. Works perfectly. I've use these with a single sheer that's a few inches wider than window setting it behind mini blinds to add privacy without sacrificing light when mini blinds are open.

reviews.title: Rod
reviews.review_text: It is very good as a product, but I ended up using the one sent with the curtain , I had to order larger hook and in doing that, I was able to use the rod that came with the curtain. But, it's a good product is a good one.

reviews.title: Won't order from Walmart again!
reviews.review_text: I never received this item! It was to be delivered to my apartment door. It was just left at the back door to the building and someone has stolen it!! I'm very upset and disappointed!!

reviews.title: Fragile ~
reviews.review_text: Be wary of this very flimsy-constructed curtain rod. on the first extension the spring popped out of the side. really disappointing. Just wanted to recommend that people purchase this for no more than a very thin, lightweight, cotton, curtain!

reviews.title: Good enough
reviews.review_text: They're delicate and can't handle much abuse but they're a good and simple choice. These were used with curtains in doorways to create privacy and to block cold air.
If you have a camper or RV, these are 18 inches to 28 inches expandable but two out of the 12 broke. They are metal with springs inside and made it cheaply. Buy extra just in case.
It was kind of lightweight and the spring rod was not that great, but it works. i just have to be careful.The drapery doesn't pull it down. it was only for a valance.

It was a good price and I don't like Amazon I like Walmart so you know it was sweet because the clerk was very friendly and I got my other items as well at the store. Some that I didn't even have on my list because the prices were so good.

reviews.title: Bends easily
reviews.review_text: The rod bend when I put one curtain on. It's very cheap material, I guess you get what you paid for.
I really wanted a brass rod..but they didn't have any more,...so I bought the white, but don't care for it. I will be returning it.

reviews.title: read review
reviews.review_text: they work really well if you have window boxes, but you can't use more than 1 sheer panel on them, or they fall.

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.review_text: This thing is so flimsy! It was stuck together and I was never able to get it apart! It bent just try to move it. It's still stuck and bent. Unusable!

reviews.title: Not as sturdy as it looks on the picture
reviews.review_text: Literally the cheapest thing ever. My window was 28" exact but this was a little smaller so it didn't fit. I'm only keeping it because it was so cheap and not worth the return, but I expected higher quality. This was Dollar Tree quality.
Good value but I received item without end caps which made it useless. I used them to cover a book shelf with a light cotton curtain (24” high) but they lose tension and will fall randomly.
I got these just for a cheap curtain rod until i got different ones. Not very good quality material, would recommend if only using as a temporary curtain rod. Easy set up !

reviews.title: Study tension rod
reviews.review_text: I purchased this to use in doorframe for macrame. It is adjustable so fits perfectly. I placed it high enough that I dont have to move it and I am ready to go whenever I like. Sturdy - doesnt bend like other versions.
I just put one side of sheer panel on it. it bend. this is very thin. and can't hold up a sheer panel up in a small bathroom window. please do not buy this.
Very poor quality. I used this rod for a very lightweight and sheer curtain and it bowed in the middle. I know it was not expensive, but I expected some type of quality.

This tension rod was too small, too short, and not sturdy enough for my 48 inch closet opening. Might be better for sheers only on a window that is no more than 32 inches or so. Rod was cheap quality for the cheap price.

reviews.title: not recomnended
reviews.review_text: I received 4 one was broken at the seam and another would twist to the full length like it was stuck. didnt event chance opening the other 2. returning all of them and i had to purchase another brand that worked out perfect.
That one window the dogs love to stare out needed a sheer panel to prevent nose art - this tension rod allowed that without the exercise in geometry called for in a conventional curtain rod

I did not receive my purchase. I saw a photo of my items at 9:30 placed outside tje bldg door but it was not there when i got to where it was shown. I reportrd this and was ignored. I was not refunded the amount and I am not happy.

reviews.title: Highly recommend 👌
reviews.review_text: Works perfectly! I ordered to hang curtains over the kitchen sink between cabinets to keep from disturbing woodwork/creating holes, easily put up and take down to wash these curtains!
Very thin, had a dent in it when it was delivered which made it hard to twist, as long as you don't put more than 3 pots pans hanging off of hooks you will be ok

reviews.title: lightweight yet strong.
reviews.review_text: For the price, it's a great value. i was worried at 1st thinking it wouldn't hold the weight of 2 black out curtains, but they fit perfect and it seems to be holding up very well. completely recommend.

reviews.title: More than just a curtain rod
reviews.review_text: I ordered this Mainstays tension rod to hang my kitchen utensils under my vent hood over my stove and it looks really good! This tension rod is sturdy, white, and just perfect. And reasonably priced.
So easy to use simply put your curtain on the rod and put it in place thats it if you need to adjust it its easy stays in place its strong too i recommend this retractable curtain rod thank you

reviews.title: Tension Curtain Rod
reviews.review_text: This worked out perfect for me as an added shelf in my spice cabinet. I did have some small clips on the side to help support the rod. I placed one rod at the back of my cabinet and was able to line it with spices. Didn't want a full shelf. Perfect.

reviews.title: Basic is all you need
reviews.review_text: This is just what I needed. It's simple, and does the job without being part of the home design which is what I wanted. It offers a basic design and holds up the curtains well. I put a light curtain on it but it looks like it will hold something a little heavier as well.

When I bought this it looked like it was for the shower when I receive it , it is Super small! I hate to return items in store because the employees are so unprofessional it's really unpleasant to deal with them so unfortunately I guess I will take it as a loss

the first one I ordered was delivered and it was bent the delivering person should have seen that it was bent and couldn't be used. second one was out of alignment and can't open no sense in getting another delivery seems they can't deliver one that works

reviews.title: Good Product, Good Price
reviews.review_text: I've purchased this product several times, in different sizes and for different purposes. This purchase was to use the rod for a Christmas window decoration. I used the rod, filament line and vintage tree ornaments, to make a very pretty window decoration. I see no reason why beading couldn't be used, to make a pretty decoration for daily use. I thought I might use crystals, to make another one. The rod suits my needs perfectly, is simple to use and inexpensive. I'm very satisfied with this product.

reviews.title: Great for light weight curtains
reviews.review_text: Great for light weight curtains and good priced. I was using for macrame curtains and they are not as strong in the center as needed so that sag a bit. Needs to be reinforced in the center of the rod. Easy to instal by just twisting the rod in or out. I still recommend these for lighter weight curtains.

reviews.title: terrible
reviews.review_text: i ordered 7 of these and they don't even work! a couple even arrived broken. i am beyond upset! that was the lousiest purchase i ever made and I'm normally a very nice person. i only wish i could get my money back but i have nothing to prove that they were broken on arrival and will be a waste of my time. I'm very disappointment.

reviews.title: Hang in there .. THEY WILL ..
reviews.review_text: When you are leasing / renting and there are no curtain rods available and you don't want to make any holes .... these rods are the greatest ... FYI if you are wanting privacy putting a rod at the top of the window and one at the bottom, then using sheers, using the pockets given .. stretch the sheers tightly, from top to bottom, use at least 4 to 6 times the width of that window for your sheers .. It gives a great look along with privacy .. My window was close to 40 inches wide ... and I used 6 window sheers per window .... No other treatment is needed ... The sheers at Walmart along with these curtains rods make a good decorative view ... (be careful to purchase the right length of sheers .. if you want this idea to work for you. White lets the light in ... ) adjustability is what counts with enough tension to hold it all tight ..

reviews.title: Flimsy tension rods
reviews.review_text: It was very flimsy, one of them actually bent in the middle and it was just not even worth the money that I spent. So I would not recommend anyone purchasing these tension rods. It was so small and one of them actually bent in the middle and it was just not even worth the money that I spent so I would not recommend anyone purchasing these tension rods. It was so small and just very not usable at all.

I'm a widow so I have to make things up as I go along. I make jewelry and I can't find a place to put the jewelry so I bought these curtain rods because they are nice round with no bad places on them and I bought some S hooks from Walmart and I'm using the S hooks to hang over the curtain rods and that way I can slide them up and down and I can hang the necklaces and bracelets from them and make them easier and so that they won't get damaged and I can see what I have made but these are really nice. They're nice and sturdy. They'll hold a lot of weight so I really am happy with them and I can recommend them to anybody. Thank you.

reviews.title: Good simple curtain rods for light curtains
reviews.review_text: Could not find these light. spring loaded rods anywhere but here they are. Just what was needed for sheer curtains to cover the bottom have of my windows. They can be inserted and removed easily as needed. So glad they were available at a great price.

reviews.title: I need the one I ordered
reviews.review_text: I received a smaller one that do t even fit my bathroom
Rod was damaged therefore it doesn't serve the purpose intended for.
it's okay, does not seem to support the weight of the clothes though and keeps falling.
Doesn't hold the tension very well and slides down every few minutes

reviews.title: Very short
reviews.review_text: There is nothing I can use it for, it's way too small
Very cheaply made, flimsy and thin diameter. Would not hold up a towel. Do not recommend.
The tension rods are easy to use and are quick to install.
The curtain rod was bent, but I received a replacement for it.
Rods works well for lightweight curtains. The price is okay for the quality.
Exactly what I needed, the right size, color and great price.
"Walmart""s delivery service for more efficient and a much better value than Instacart."

reviews.title: A bit flimsy when extended
reviews.review_text: rod a little flimsy. No choice it was all the site offered.
Adjusting it was horrible and I don't know if I broke it or it just wouldn't extend
This did not perform as it should have... I was very disappointed with it

reviews.title: Curtain rod
reviews.review_text: They're really good Spring Rod for your curtains

reviews.title: Work!
reviews.review_text: Exactly what I needed to hang curtains at the office
i thought i was buying a shower cutain rod thats what i searched for

reviews.title: would be ok if not damaged
reviews.review_text: Rod was bent and smashed so it's unusable

reviews.title: Lightweight
reviews.review_text: Great for lightweight items that need to be hung.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: All the rods that I received was all bent. It looks like whoever was packing it couldn’t did the right size box and just bent all the rods to make it fit the box. Or I got a defective rods. Very disappointed with Walmart online order. I will have to go to the store and exchange them. I whole point of ordering online is to avoid going to an actual store. Hopefully they have it on stock. The actual delivery was on time but the product ordered was disappointedly defective.
The rods were broken on purchase. The rod would not compress and extend. I bought a pair of them. Both were messed up.

reviews.title: Served their purpose!

reviews.title: Tiny little thing!!

reviews.review_text: Easy to install in my 49" wide window. Tension adjusted easily, held a heavy curtain without sliding.

reviews.title: Great quality at a nice low price!

reviews.title: Great spring rod

reviews.review_text: Hard to extend. Takes a lot to turn the rod

I couldn't use it for what i bought it for, i saw a hack....anywho... I'll re-purpose it. Priced right.

The rod will hold seasonal quilted wall hangings. The smooth ends prevent any damage and make inserting a different panel a simple task.

reviews.title: Stronger than what it looks
reviews.review_text: I was a little leery of this when I got it. I was not sure that it would be strong enough to Hold my curtains, but it works great. I am very pleased.
the rod isn't very strong. Can't use it to it's fullest size because the 2 parts disconnect before you'd expect.
It works. The rubber part comes off and on easily. The rod is already splitting at the seam, but it doesn't matter for my use.
A bit challenging to get it to open up at first but I figured it out. It does the job and is hidden nicely
It didn't hold up great when weight was added to the rod but after stabilizing with some screws on either end it is staying put.

reviews.title: Doesn't work and keeps falling down

picture is deceiving, thought it had more of a shower rod diameter. this item will bend on half very easily.
Let's be honest here- for the price you can't go wrong! Used them in my living quarters horse trailer, all I needed and more!
Good size, color and quality. Arrived promptly and undamaged. Ordered from you because price better than elsewhere.

it arrived damaged and was not usable. Walmart quickly refunded my money and told me to discard the item

I shop other places, Walmart is where I end up cause they always have what I need and everyone is so helpful

reviews.title: Easy up curtain rods
reviews.review_text: These are lightweight inside mount curtain rods, exactly what I wanted. They are easily adjustable, no hardware required.
this is a CAFE curtain rod very disappointed when i received it your description should include either 'small' 'thin' or 'cafe curtain rod'

reviews.title: thin and flimsy rod

reviews.title: Works great for what we needed it for
reviews.review_text: Works great for what we needed it for. My wife and I used it to hang some curtains up for some extra darkness for our bedroom. We don't have a bedroom door, so the sun comes through from the living room. We fixed that issue and are happy.

reviews.title: Tension Curtain Rod
reviews.review_text: I purchased this tension curtain rod for a kitchen window. I was unable to use a rod that required attaching to the wall beside the window. This tension rod worked perfectly.

opened package loosened until desired position won't extend without spreading apart and breaking. I've returned the product to store to try again twice. I'm done trying to work with this brand. Thank you

l bought a new one from you and it was already broken and I'm okay with that but people need to tell someone when stuff is not good anymore because I don't like buying broken stuff okay that's why I gave it a very low rate in the Stars....

Item is exactly what I need. I live in a rental environment that doesn't allow for installation of window treatment hardware. These tension rods fit my window sizes and hold various weights of fabric. This increasing options of curtains.

reviews.title: Never Delivered
reviews.review_text: Never received my order even though Walmart email said it was delivered. No photo was produced showing package delivered. Cannot get refund via Walmart web site.

reviews.title: strong fir size
reviews.review_text: tension rod did just what i needed. i used it to wrap garland around and used it between my kitchen cabinets. Worked perfectly! Price was very reasonable, tension was strong
These roads are extremely easy to use and even better because you don't have to have any extra hardware to hang something. It just fits inside the window frame.
This item was use for hanging my kitchen curtain. To make adjustments all I had to do twist the rod to make the length big to smaller. Inexpensive rod with great quality.

reviews.title: Good for light curtains
reviews.review_text: Fine for curtains but can't hold much weight. I wanted to use it to hang drying laundry from. At the 3rd t-shirt it started slipping. Can't knock the value, at less than $4 I really can't complain too much.

reviews.title: Cannot hold weighty curtains
reviews.review_text: Appropriate with sheers that aren't open/closed frequently. Rod is very thin, cannot hold a weighty curtain, and if open/closed frequently the rod can be pulled down.

reviews.title: Total darkness problem solved.
reviews.review_text: Worked great for hanging black out curtains in a doorway where I don't have a door. So my daughter can sleep without the light from upstairs getting in her room. Not able to put a door there. Next best solution.

reviews.title: Great for purpose, price, and design.
reviews.review_text: I don't usually use tention rods because they seem to fall. I used some hardware tools this time (screws, screwdriver) to secure the curtain in my home where a traditional curtain rod was not able. That did the trick. Recommend.

reviews.title: Easy to install. No tools. No fuss
reviews.review_text: These small tension rods were exactly what I needed to add a simple valence to multiple windows withour any tools. Installs in seconds easliy and will be simple to remove anytime without any damage to walls

reviews.title: Delivery fail
reviews.review_text: The product itself was fine. However, it arrived via delivery bent and unusable. It required more wrapping and packaging for delivery. Unable to use it.

Don't waste your money, it's not worth it. It's super flimsy and can barely hold up (1) curtain panel (forget about it holding up 2). If you're gonna buy this product, make sure you either have a support hook or are only using short sheer curtains.

reviews.title: Good buy
reviews.review_text: I had to hang wireless curtains , using command strips. So, I didn't want a heavy rod. These are lightweight, yet hold well. I have a blackout curtain which isn't light. It fits well too, is expandable. Happy with my purchase.

reviews.title: easy to assemble and use no screws needed
reviews.review_text: saves time from having to do curtain hangers. I cover my windows from the sun and take the curtains down when I do not need them. And do not have curtain attachments to the wall. Fits perfectly within the window frame.

reviews.title: Faulty Tension Rod
reviews.review_text: The tension rod does not hold up by itself. I originally wanted to use it to hang Christmas garland but the rod kept sliding down the wall even after adjusting it several times.

reviews.title: Only for light weight curtains
reviews.review_text: This would work just fine for a ultra light curtain, but my curtain was way too heavy and it immediately bent the rod. I knew the rod was small, but I was hoping that because it was made out of metal that it would be a little stronger than it was.
It's exactly what I needed for a small window in the bathroom. The window frame is white and the curtain rod is invisible once the curtain is put on.
They are just what I need. Reasonably priced. And always available. I've ordered the curtain rods for the second or third time now. You can never have too many tension rods.
I feel the rod is a bit flimsy, but I can probably still make it work.
Perfect for hanging out bedroom curtains! The extra support middle screw in hook works great!😊
